name: Growing Pig
description:
It's here! Growing Pig lets you have your own cute pigs as pets. They eat, sleep, and they will give you gifts when you visit them enough.

You can take them on the exciting Truffle Hunt to get mushrooms and truffles, which you can use to get clothes, beds, bowls and other stuff for your Pigs.

You can also choose from a variety of different breeds of pigs, all with their own personalities.

Download Growing Pig now for your own very own pet pig!

Features:
- Cute, hand drawn graphics
- Real pig sounds
- Go on an exciting Truffle hunt
- Created with love and care
- Different Pig types to choose from and collect
- Turn your Pig into a baby pig again for bonuses
